Title: Recent progress and outlook for coherent PON
Abstract: © OSA 2018.Coherent receivers offer high data rates and reach for optical access but, due to their complexity, have proved resistant to implementation. Here, recent research in low-complexity coherent PON is reviewed, and promising future research directions are identified.
